title: [NUA][1.0.0]有史以来最大的mod= =音乐光碟mod
author: rainsillwood
txt_content:
本帖最后由 rainsillwood 于 2012-6-4 23:29 编辑 

这个mod有200多MB= =网站又限制线程数，加上是FQ所以下的很痛苦，不过总算是搞下来了
大的原因主要是里头有50多首新歌（有民众们喜闻乐见的NyaNyaCat哟~），还能添加你自定义的10首~
歌曲目录：

Epic Sax GuyAlways Look On The Bright Side Of Life (Monty Python version)Fail Song (download to see which song it is :P)Nyan CatTrolololRick Astley - Never Gonna Give You UpGunther - Ding Ding DongDJ Splash - Flying HighFinntroll - Trollhammaren (a folk-metal song I really like)Skrillex - EquinoxPokemon - Theme SongDwarf HoleThey Are Taking The Hobbits To IsengardRammstein - Du HastRammstein - Ich WillCaptainSparklez and TryHardNinja - RevengeLMFAO - Sexy And I Know ItDragonforce - Through The Fire And FlamesCaramella Girls - Caramelldansen (Swedisch Version)Deadmau - Ghosts 'n StuffMChammer - U Can't Touch ThisNight at the Roxbury - What is LoveDaft Punk - Harder, Better, Faster, StrongerInTheLittleWood - Form This WayLinkin Park - What I've DoneJohnny Cash - A Boy Named SueLMFAO - Party Rock AntemCaptainSparklez - TNTLMFAO - Champagne Showers (Remake)Dragonforce - Fury Of The StormNine Inch Nails - ReptileDJ Tiësto - In Search Of SunlightGamma Ray - Into The StormGamma Ray - Spiritual DictatorGamma Ray - How LongGamma Ray - Real WorldGamma Ray - EmpressGamma Ray - Blood ReligionDimrain47 - Twilight TechnoGigi D' Agostino - The RiddleDJ Mangoo - EurodancerDJ Splash - Beautiful DayNightwish - Bye Bye BeautifulNightwish - CrownlessNightwish - Over The Hills And Far AwayPerfect World - Fly With MePerfect World - Fly With Me Metal VersionStratovarius - Why Are We HereSabaton - Swedish PagansLvl 70 etc. - I Am MurlocRandom Song 1Random Song 2Random Song 3Random Song 4Random Song 5Random Song 6Random Song 7Random Song 8Random Song 9Random Song 10
注意：有的CD只能从TMI里面调出来哟，至于怎么加Random的歌曲么……正在试验中
就是这样喵~
（内心深处：看在这么辛苦的份上，有什么都赏点吧……）

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 。。。。神马以太就别说了 那些一般的更多矿物mod都比这个mod大

replies.author: qyn614
replies.txt_content:
唔，对于自定义音乐很感兴趣...
不过看着200M的情况下，...决定等楼主实验成功后再拖吧...
我懒人了我忏悔
这种mod最容易做  但歌曲的选择就很麻烦

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 原来是压缩包大小- - 好吧我所知道的最大60多m

replies.author: kaiken005
replies.txt_content:
我想問一下
為什麼我入了mod後
入minecraft 出不到聲音?

replies.author: rainsillwood
replies.txt_content:
kaiken005 发表于 2011-12-11 17:26 
我想問一下
為什麼我入了mod後
入minecraft 出不到聲音?
1.音乐文件都放进resourse文件夹下了么?
2.audiomod装没装?
3.装了还有问题的话,进入游戏按F3+S试试
4.这些音乐都是用CD机和CD放的,不是BGM= =(不是这个[note_block],长得跟他很像的上面有条缝的)
